name: Pong Ping (itch)
description:
Hello Community,

another small project from us. Basically it is Pong with little extras. You can play the classic version with fixed positions or the half- or full-roam version.

The controls for the red player is WASD und for the blue player the arrow keys. So you can play with a friend on one screen and also play against an AI or let the AI compete to each other.

The ball will be faster with every player hit. The player who scores 7 points first wins the game. Restart the game at any time with the "R" key.

So let the old times revive! Have fun!
